Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the incident by stating that the statue of Hindu goddess Kali was set alight by jihadists. The evidence provided by the expert suggests that the fire was an accident and not caused by any intentional act.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the fire was an accident, as confirmed by the West Bengal Police and the head of the Hindu temple where the incident occurred.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on photos shared on a religious group's Facebook page without any additional evidence or verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fire was caused by jihadists without presenting any substantial evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation provided by the West Bengal Police and the temple authorities is that the fire was an accident and not caused by any Muslim mob, as claimed by some local people.
